name: Fossil Quest 64
description:
Hello Archaeologist.

It is your destiny to calm the grumpy spirits of three creatures from the very dawn of life. Collect their fossils to free their angered spirits.

Explore, battle ancient creatures, and collect fossils. The Trilobite of Wisdom will be pleased.

------------------------------------------------------

Created in just one weekend for the ROM's Dawn of Life Game Jam 2016, Fossil Quest 64 is an exploration and combat adventure featuring long-extinct creatures and roughly a 5 minute play time.

Enjoy!
